Publisher.PublisherName: National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE)

Book.CollectionTitle: National Institute for Health and Care Excellence: Clinical Guidelines

Abstract.AbstractText: This guideline covers managing COVID-19 in babies, children, young people and adults in community and hospital settings. It includes recommendations on communication, assessment, therapeutics for COVID-19, non-invasive respiratory support, preventing and managing acute complications, and identifying and managing co-infections. NICE has also produced COVID-19 rapid guidelines on managing long-term effects of COVID-19 (‘long COVID’) and haematopoietic stem cell transplantation.
